code: var _this=this;export var handleWatchList=function handleWatchList(){if(_this.state.watch==true){axios.get("/removeFromList/watch/"+_this.props.movie.id).then(function(res){_this.setState({watch:false,love:_this.state.love,hate:_this.state.hate,later:_this.state.later,like:_this.state.like});console.log(_this.props.lists);});}else{axios.get("/addToList/watch/"+_this.props.movie.id).then(function(res){_this.setState({watch:true,love:_this.state.love,hate:_this.state.hate,later:_this.state.later,like:_this.state.like});console.log(_this.state);});}};var
